sn48.66:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.66:4.6: Because of developing and cultivating these five faculties, seven fruits and benefits can be expected.
sn48.66:4.8: They attain enlightenment early on in this very life. If not, they attain enlightenment at the time of death.
sn48.66:4.9: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters, they’re extinguished in-between one life and the next … they’re extinguished upon landing … they’re extinguished without extra effort … they’re extinguished with extra effort … they head upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
sn48.66:4.10: Because of developing and cultivating these five faculties, these seven fruits and benefits can be expected.”
